fn.p: Author contributions F.S. designed the study, ran models and analysed outputs. M.R.-R., S.H.-P., B.W.B., R.G., Z.J., G.J.P., G.H.M. and R.G.R. built the FosSahul database. D.A.F. and D.N.-B. provided palaeoclimate simulations using HadCM3. F.S. and C.J.A.B. wrote the first draft. F.S., B.W.B., A.C., C.N.J., C.S.M.T. and C.J.A.B. contributed equally to discussion of ideas and analyses, and all authors helped write and comment on the manuscript.
